thread.title: 2017 Marked Safest Year in Commercial Aviation History

author: Andy Pasztor
title: 2017 Marked Safest Year in Commercial Aviation History
text:
The global airline industry achieved a previously unimaginable safety milestone in 2017: independent accident data doesnâ€™t indicate a single airline passenger fatality resulting from a jet crash anywhere in the world.
The statistic, released Monday by a Dutch affiliate of the U.S.-based nonprofit Flight Safety Foundation, excludes cargo flights, military transports and accidents caused by intentional acts.
